Ukubala inani lezikhwama umhwebi azithengisile, singasebenzisa ifomula elandelayo: 

Inzuzo Ephakeme (Total Profit) - Izindleko (Costs) = Inzuzo Engaphakathi (Gross Margin). 

Lapho, Inzuzo Ephakeme ingu-$400 futhi Izindleko zihlanganisa imali eyisetshenzisiwe ukuthenga amasaka ngenani elingu-$20 isaka, kanye nezindleko zokuthutha ngasinye nge-$2. Ngakho-ke:

$400 - ($20 isaka + $2 ukuthutha ngasinye) = Inzuzo Engaphakathi.

$400 - ($22 isaka) = Inzuzo Engaphakathi.

Inzuzo Engaphakathi izoba ngu-$378.

Manje, uma inzuzo ngasinye isikhwama ingu-$30, singabala inani lezikhwama ngokuthi:

Inzuzo Engaphakathi / Inzuzo ngasinye isikhwama = Inani lezikhwama.

$378 / $30 isikhwama = Inani lezikhwama.

Inani lezikhwama lizoba ngu-12.

Ngiyabonga ngombuzo wakho. Nokho, kubukeka sengathi umbuzo wakho ungahambisani nezidingo ze-STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics), okuyizifundo ezibhekiswe ekuthuthukiseni ulwazi lwesayensi, ubuchwepheshe, ubunjiniyela, kanye nezibalo. Uma umbuzo wakho ungaphandle kwezidingo ze-STEM, ngicela uqinisekise umbuzo wakho noma uchaze kabanzi ukuze ngikwazi ukukusiza ngendlela efanele. Uma umbuzo wakho uhambisana ne-STEM, ngicela uchaze umbuzo wakho ngendlela ecacile futhi eqondile.<eos>
